	window.onscroll = function() {scrollSticky()};

	
	var header = document.getElementById("secondHeader");
	var sticky = header.offsetTop;
    if(document.getElementById('PluginsIcon')){var elmnt22 = document.getElementById('PluginsIcon')}

	function scrollSticky() {
		
	  try{
		  var itsMobile = false;
		  if(document.getElementById('bablicFlagsWidget').style.bottom == '40px'){
			 itsMobile = true;
		  }	
		  if (window.pageYOffset > sticky) {
			header.classList.add("sticky");
			elmnt22.style.top = '50px';  
			  !itsMobile ? document.getElementById('bablicFlagsWidget').style.top = '5px' : '';
		  } else {
			header.classList.remove("sticky");
			  elmnt22.style.top = '5px'; 
			  !itsMobile ? document.getElementById('bablicFlagsWidget').style.top = '51px' : '';
		  }		  
	  }
	  catch{}
	}
    
	var CurrentProductsArray = Object.keys(obj2);
	var CurrentProductsLowerer = CurrentProductsArray.map(x => x.toLowerCase());
	// IF header is a plugin will go to else
	
	var DefaultHeader = document.getElementById('includedHeader').getAttribute('SimLabHeaderType').toLowerCase();
	var MultiHeader = document.getElementById('includedHeader').getAttribute('SimLabMultiHeader');
	var currentHeader = ''
	
	localStoredHeader =  getCookie("SimLabLastHeader");
	


	var indx, headertype
	//function GetLocalStoprage() {
	//return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
	//    var CurrentStorage = localStorage.getItem('customHeaderValue')
	//    resolve(CurrentStorage)
	//    })
	//}
	//
	//GetLocalStoprage().then(localStoredHeader => {
	//	console.log('localStoredHeader:')
	//	const xxx = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(localStoredHeader))
	//	console.log(xxx)
	//	console.log(MultiHeader)
	//	if (MultiHeader !== null & localStoredHeader !== null) {		
	//		if (MultiHeader.toLowerCase().indexOf(localStoredHeader) > -1) {
	//			console.log(MultiHeader.toLowerCase().indexOf(localStoredHeader))
	//			currentHeader = localStoredHeader
	//		} 
	//	}
	//	console.log('currentHeader:')
	//	console.log(currentHeader)
	////	localStorage.setItem("customHeaderValue", currentHeader);
	//	if (CurrentProductsLowerer.includes(currentHeader) && !(currentHeader.includes('plugin'))) {
	//		indx = CurrentProductsLowerer.findIndex((element) => element === currentHeader);
	//		headertype = CurrentProductsArray[indx];
	//		document.getElementById('secondHeader').style.display = 'block';
	//		changer();
	//	}
	//	
	//	if(currentHeader.includes('plugin')) { 
	//        headertype_score = currentHeader;
	//		headertype = 'plugin';
	//		document.getElementById('secondHeader').style.display = 'block';
	//		ReadJson();
	//	}
	//    localStorage.setItem("customHeaderValue", currentHeader);
	//	console.log(currentHeader)
	//
	//  })	

	function startHeader(){
		console.log(currentHeader + ":CurrentHeader");
		if (CurrentProductsLowerer.includes(currentHeader) && !(currentHeader.includes('plugin'))) {
			indx = CurrentProductsLowerer.findIndex((element) => element === currentHeader);
			headertype = CurrentProductsArray[indx];
			document.getElementById('secondHeader').style.display = 'block';
			changer();
		}

		if(currentHeader.includes('plugin')) { 
			headertype_score = currentHeader;
			headertype = 'plugin';
			document.getElementById('secondHeader').style.display = 'block';
			ReadJson();
		}		
	}

	
	// To handel json files and get older versions and to mentain download button
	function ReadJson() {
		console.log('Reading...')
		const body = {
			method: 'GET'
		}
		fetch('/plugins_count/download-links.json', body).then(response => {
		  return response.json();
		}).then(data => {
		  // Work with JSON data here
		  console.log(data);
		  JsonLinks = data;
		  changer();
		}).catch(err => {
			console.log(err)
		  // Do something for an error here
		}); 
	}	 
	//-------------------
	
	function changer(){
		obj2[headertype].map(x => {
			 var slogen_large = document.getElementById("slogen_large");
			 var logo_small = document.getElementById("logo_small");
			 var logo_small2 = document.getElementById("logo_small2");
			 var img_tall = document.getElementById("img_tall");
			 var img_logo = document.getElementById("img_logo");
			 var img_tall2 = document.getElementById("img_tall2");
			 var img_logo2 = document.getElementById("img_logo2");
			 var button_small_inner_href = document.getElementById("button_small_inner_href"+x.list);
			 var button_small_outer_class = document.getElementById("button_small_outer_class");
			 var button_small_inner_classheader_vrstudio = document.getElementById("button_small_inner_classheader_vrstudio");
			 var button_small_inner_class = document.getElementById("button_small_inner_class"+x.list);
			 var button_small_outer_href = document.getElementById("button_small_outer_href");
			 var small_header_logo = document.getElementById("small-header-logo");
			
			 var img_tall2 = document.getElementById("img_tall2");
			 var header_svg = document.getElementById("header-svg");
			 var mainHref = document.getElementById("mainHref");
					    
			 try {slogen_large.innerHTML = x.slogen_large;} catch (error){}
			 try {logo_small.innerHTML = x.logo_small;} catch (error){}
			 try {logo_small2.innerHTML = x.logo_small;} catch (error){}
			 try {img_tall.classList.add(x.button_small_color_class);} catch (error){}
			 try {img_logo.src = x.img_logo;} catch (error){}
			 try {img_tall2.classList.add(x.button_small_color_class);} catch (error){}
			 try {img_logo2.src = x.img_logo;} catch (error){}
			 try {button_small_inner_href.setAttribute("href", x.button_small_href);} catch (error){}
			 try {button_small_outer_class.classList.add(x.button_small_color_class);
				  
				  
				  if(window.location.href.indexOf('vocational') > 0){
					  button_small_outer_class.innerText = "Free Trial";
					  button_small_inner_classheader_vrstudio.innerText = "Free Trial";
				  }
				  else if(window.location.href.indexOf('free') > 0){
					  button_small_outer_class.innerText = "Get Free Edition";
					  button_small_inner_classheader_vrstudio.innerText = "Get Free Edition";
				  }
//				  else if(DefaultHeader == 'composer'){
//					  button_small_outer_class.innerText = "Get Free Edition";
//					  button_small_inner_classheader_vrstudio.innerText = "Get Free Edition";
//				  }
				  else if(window.location.href.indexOf('collaboration') > 0){
					  button_small_outer_class.innerText = "Start, it's free";
					  button_small_inner_classheader_vrstudio.innerText = "Start, it's free";
				  }			  
				  else{
				     button_small_outer_class.innerText = x.button_small_outer_class_text;
				  }
				 } catch (error){}
			 try {button_small_inner_class.classList.add(x.button_small_color_class);} catch (error){}
			 try {button_small_outer_href.setAttribute("href", x.button_small_href);} catch (error){}
			 try {small_header_logo.setAttribute("href", x.mainHref);} catch (error){}
			 try {img_tall2.classList.add(x.button_small_color_class);} catch (error){}
			 try {header_svg.classList.add(x.img_tall);} catch (error){}
			 try {mainHref.setAttribute("href", x.mainHref);} catch (error){}
			
			
			 // The code from here can handel the plugins header
			 if(headertype.includes('plugin')){ 
				document.getElementById("header_"+headertype).style.display = 'flex';
				document.getElementById("allplugins").style.display = 'none';
				document.getElementById("helplist").style.display = 'none';

				 
				var str = headertype_score;
				var arr = [];
				application = str.split('_')[1];
                plugin = str.split('_')[2];
 
				 // To handel if the plugin header is general
				 if (x[application] === undefined) {
					 application = 'general'
					 }
				 if (x[application][plugin] === undefined) {
					 plugin = 'main'
					 }
				var downloadLink_part1 = 'https://www.simlab-soft.com/plugins_count/plugin-download.aspx';
				var downloadLink_part2 = application.toLowerCase() + '_' + plugin.toLocaleLowerCase();

				// Replace ./data.json with your JSON feed and add older download button if there is
				var AvailableVersions = JsonLinks.filter(element => {
					return (element.name.includes(application.toLowerCase() + '_' + plugin.toLocaleLowerCase()))
				});
				 var helpList = x[application][plugin].help;
				 var PluginLinks = x[application][plugin].links;
				 if (AvailableVersions.length > 1) { // check if there is older versions available
					 if (PluginLinks === undefined) {
						 PluginLinks = []
						 }
					 PluginLinks.push([downloadLink_part1 +'#' + downloadLink_part2 + '_old', 'Downloads', 9])
				 }
				 
				 
				 var CustomListVar = x[application][plugin].customList;
					 if (CustomListVar != undefined) {
							CustomListVar.forEach(element => {
								ListGenerator(element.listLinks , element.listName, element.listName, element.listName === undefined ? 7 : element.order)
							});
					 }	
				 //------------------------------------------
				 // 1(all plugins)----2()----3(general links)------4()-----5(plugin links)------6()-----7()-----8(help list)----9()----- 10(button)
				 
				 
				 //Handel List and links
				 ListGenerator(x[application].allplugins ,'allplugins', x[application].name + ' Plugins', 1) // All plugins
				 ListGenerator(helpList ,'helplist', 'Help', 8) // HELP	


				if (x[application].links !== undefined && x[application].links !== null && x[application].links.length > 0) {
					x[application].links.forEach(element => { // General Application Links
						console.log(x[application].links)
						LinkGenerator(element, element[2] === undefined ? 3 : element[2]);
					});
				 }
				 
				 
				 try{				
					 PluginLinks.forEach(element => { // Plugin Links
					LinkGenerator(element, element[2] === undefined ? 5 : element[2]);
				});}
				 catch{}
					 
					 
				 // No button handel
				 if (x[application][plugin].nobutton === true) {
					 button_small_outer_href.style.visibility = 'hidden';
					 document.getElementById("mainButton").style.visibility = 'hidden';
				 }
				 // Custom button handel
				 if (x[application][plugin].custombuttontext !== undefined) { 
						button_small_outer_class.innerText = x[application][plugin].custombuttontext;
						document.getElementById("button_small_inner_classheader_plugins").innerHTML = x[application][plugin].custombuttontext;
					 }
				 if (x[application][plugin].custombuttonlink !== undefined) {
						button_small_outer_href.setAttribute("href", x[application][plugin].custombuttonlink);
						document.getElementById("button_small_inner_href"+x.list).setAttribute("href", x[application][plugin].custombuttonlink);
			      } else {
					button_small_outer_href.setAttribute("href", downloadLink_part1 + '#' + downloadLink_part2);
					document.getElementById("button_small_inner_href"+x.list).setAttribute("href", downloadLink_part1 + '#' + downloadLink_part2);
				  }
				  try {slogen_large.innerHTML = x[application][plugin].name;} catch (error){}
				 
				 
				 // Functions for List and links
				 function LinkGenerator (LinkList, order) {
					var AddedButtons = ''
					if (LinkList !== undefined && LinkList !== null && LinkList.length > 0) {
							AddedButtons += '<li class="nav-item pl-0 ml-4 mr-4 font16 pt-0 pl-2 pr-2 borderRad_6" style="order:' + order + ';"><a class="nav-link font16" href="' + LinkList[0] + '">' + LinkList[1] + '</a></li>';
						 }
					var Header = document.getElementById('header_plugin')
					Header.innerHTML += AddedButtons
				 }
				 
				 function ListGenerator (List, ListID, ListName, order = 7) {
					if (List !== undefined && List !== null) {
						if(document.getElementById(ListID)){
							var content = document.getElementById(ListID);
						}
						else{
							// Create a new element
							var elem = document.querySelector('#helplist');
							// Create a copy of it
							var content = elem.cloneNode(true);
							content.style.order = order;
							content.className("scrll");
							content.setAttribute("id", ListID);
							// Get the reference node
							// Insert the new node before the reference node
							elem.after(content);							
						}
				        
						var ComputedList = ''
						if (List.length > 1) {
							content.style.display = 'block';
							ComputedList += '<a class="nav-link font16 dropdown-toggle d-flex" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#" role="button" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false">' + ListName +'<div class="arrow-animation font12 pl-1 pr-1 d-inline-flex m-auto"><img src="https://www.simlab-soft.com/Simlabimages/SimLab_Brand_Elements/arrow-down.svg" width="11" alt="arrow down"/></div></a><div class="dropdown-menu borderRad_6 scrll" ' + (ListName.toLocaleLowerCase() === 'all plugins' ? ' style="overflow-y: scroll;max-height:500px"': '') + ' >'
							List.forEach(element => {
								ComputedList += '<a class="dropdown-item font14 pl-3 pr-3 position-relative borderRad_6_T_L borderRad_6_T_R position-relative" href="'+ element[0] +'">'+ element[1] + '</a>';
							});
							ComputedList += '</div>'
						}
						else {  
								ComputedList += '<li class="nav-item pl-0 ml-4 mr-4 font16 pt-0 pl-2 pr-2 borderRad_6" style="order:' + 3 + ';"><a class="nav-link font16" href="' + List[0][0] + '">' + List[0][1] + '</a></li>';
						}
						content.innerHTML = ComputedList
					} else {
						document.getElementById(ListID).style.display = 'none';
					}
				 }
			}else{
				document.getElementById("header_"+headertype).style.display = 'flex';
			}
		});	
		console.log('currentHeader before save')
		console.log(currentHeader)
		if (currentHeader !== null && currentHeader !== '') {
			setCookie("SimLabLastHeader", currentHeader, 30);
			}
	}	

	
	function setCookie(cname,cvalue,exdays) {
	  const d = new Date();
	  d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
	  let expires = "expires=" + d.toUTCString();
	  document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";" + expires + ";path=/";
	}

	function getCookie(cname) {
	  let name = cname + "=";
	  let decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
	  let ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
	  for(let i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
		let c = ca[i];
		while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
		  c = c.substring(1);
		}
		if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
		  return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
		}
	  }
	  return "";
	}


	if (MultiHeader !== null && localStoredHeader !== null) {	
		if (MultiHeader.toLowerCase().indexOf(localStoredHeader) > -1) {
			currentHeader = localStoredHeader;
			startHeader();

		} else {
			currentHeader = DefaultHeader
			startHeader();
		}
	}else{
		currentHeader = DefaultHeader
		startHeader();
	}
     
		
	// Change Buy Link Based ON the Country and this step to have binifets for the resellers
    let locationCountry;
	localStoredHeader =  getCookie("SimLabCountry3");
	console.log(localStoredHeader);
	if(localStoredHeader == '' || localStoredHeader == null || localStoredHeader == undefined){ console.log('fetch');	
		fetch('https://api.ipregistry.co/?key=ymjwlfwie33jg7nj')
		.then(function (response) {
		return response.json();
		})
		.then(function (payload) {
		locationCountry = payload.location.country.code;setCookie("SimLabCountry3", payload.location.country.code, 1);find_link_by_href("buy");
		});
	}else{
        	console.log('saved');locationCountry = localStoredHeader;find_link_by_href("buy");	
	}
	
	function find_link_by_href(address){
		links = document.getElementsByTagName("a");
		for(var i = 0; i < links.length; i++) {
		     if(links[i].href.includes(address)) {
				if(locationCountry == 'CZ'){
					 if(links[i].href.includes('/3d-products/simlab-composer-buy.aspx')){
						 links[i].href = "https://www.simlab-soft.cz/objednavka-3d-simlab-composer";
					 }
					 if(links[i].href.includes('/3d-products/vr-studio-buy.aspx'))
					 {
						 links[i].href = "https://www.simlab-soft.cz/objednavka-simlab-vr-studio";
					 }			
				}
				else if (locationCountry == 'SK'){
					 if(links[i].href.includes('/3d-products/simlab-composer-buy.aspx')){
						 links[i].href = "https://www.simlab-soft.sk/objednavka-3d-simlab-composer";
					 }	
					 if(links[i].href.includes('/3d-products/vr-studio-buy.aspx'))
					 {   
						 links[i].href = "https://www.simlab-soft.sk/objednavka-simlab-vr-studio";
					 }
				}
				else{}
			}												  
		 }
	     return;
	}
		
    // END

</script>

    position:relative;
}

.dark .d-flex {display: -ms-flexbox !important;display: flex !important;}
.dark .d-inline-flex {display: -ms-inline-flexbox !important;display: inline-flex !important;}
.dark .float-left {float: left !important;}
.dark .float-right {float: right !important;}

							</ul>							
							<ul class="navbar-nav ml-auto h-100" id="header_vrcollaboration">

	</div>		
	</header>
</header></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_with_border et_pb_section et_pb_section_2 et_pb_with_background et_pb_inner_shadow et_section_regular"><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_0"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_0  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_post_title et_pb_post_title_0 et_pb_bg_layout_light  et_pb_text_align_left"><div class="et_pb_title_container"><h1 class="entry-title">Privacy Policy</h1><p class="et_pb_title_meta_container"></p></div></div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner">July 13, 2023<p></p></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_1"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_1  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p><span style="font-family: inherit; font-weight: normal; font-size: medium;">SimLab-Soft respects the privacy of our users and has developed this Privacy Policy to demonstrate its commitment to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy is intended to describe to you how and what data we collect, and how and why we use your personal data. It also describes options we provide for you to access, update, or otherwise take control of your personal data that we process.</span></p><p><span style="font-family: inherit; font-weight: normal; font-size: medium;">We encourage you to read this Privacy Policy carefully when using our website, products, services or transacting business with us. By using our websites or any of our programs, you are accepting the practices described in this Privacy Policy.</span></p></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_2"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_2  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_2  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2>Definitions</h2><p>Throughout this document, we may use certain words or phrases, and it is important that you understand the meaning of them. The following is a non-exhaustive list of definitions of words and phrases found in this document:</p><ul> <li><span style="font-family: inherit; font-size: small;">“<strong>Program</strong>” refers to one of our software applications including “Simlab composer” and Simlab plugins.</span></li> <li><span style="font-family: inherit; font-size: small;">“<strong>Installer</strong>” refers to the program that installs our Program.</span></li> <li><span style="font-family: inherit; font-size: small;">“<strong>SimLab-Soft</strong>” refers to our company, our Site, our Products, our Services, or a combination of all or some of the preceding definitions, depending on the context in which the word is used.</span></li> <li><span style="font-family: inherit; font-size: small;">“<strong>Service</strong>” refers to the services that we provide, including our Site, our Programs and Our Installers.</span></li> <li><span style="font-family: inherit; font-size: small;">“<strong>Site</strong>” refers to our websites, including: <a href="http://www.simlab-soft.com">http://www.simlab-soft.com</a> and http:// <a href="http://www.simlabforum.com">http://www.simlabforum.com</a> .</span></li> <li><span style="font-family: inherit; font-size: small;">“<strong>User</strong>” refers to anyone who uses one or more of our Programs, Installers, Sites, or Services in general.</span></li> <li><span style="font-family: inherit; font-size: small;">“<strong>You</strong>” refers to you, the person who is governed by this Privacy Policy.</span></li></ul></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_3"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_3  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_3  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2>What information do we collect?</h2><p>We request and/or process data from you when you visit and perform an action on our website, or register our software. The following is the data we request and/or process for different actions you perform on the website or within our programs.</p><p>When contacting us, licensing our product, requesting support or registering on our forum, you may be asked to provide your:</p><ul> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Name</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">E-mail address</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Company name</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Mailing address</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Phone number</span></li></ul><p>When requesting support or licensing a new product, additional information may include:</p><ul> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Software details</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Hardware details</span></li></ul><p>When ordering a product, additional information may include:</p><ul> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Billing address</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Credit card information</span></li></ul><p>Other information that may automatically be captured when visiting our site or submitting a form include:</p><ul> <li><span style="font-size: small;">IP address</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Country</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Time of visit and/or time of form submission</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Other data that could directly or indirectly identify you</span></li></ul></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_4"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_4  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_4  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2>What legal basis do we have for processing personal data?</h2><p>Processing of your personal data requires a legal basis. Processing of your data is only done when necessary to provide the relevant information for the stated purpose. These purposes includes:</p><ul> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Providing software licensing information</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Providing software update and upgrade information</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Providing answers to queries about updates, upgrades, issues, and licensing</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Providing communication about updates, upgrades, issues, and licensing</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Providing communication via email in the form of newsletters, special offers, and event promotion</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">Providing ongoing service and support</span></li></ul><p>The most predominant legal bases for our processing of your personal data are:</p><ul> <li><span style="font-size: small;">When SimLab Soft is pursuing legitimate interests</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">When you provide consent</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">When we’ve entered into a contract with you</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;">When we have a legal obligation or requirement</span></li></ul></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_5"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_5  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_5  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2>What do we use your information for?</h2><p>Any of the information we collect from you may be used in one of the following ways:</p><ul> <li><span style="font-size: small;"><strong><em>To personalize your experience</em></strong></span><br><span style="font-size: small;"> Your information helps us to better respond to your individual needs.</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;"><strong><em>To improve our website</em></strong></span><br><span style="font-size: small;"> We continually strive to improve our website offerings based on the information and feedback we receive from you.</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;"><strong><em>To improve customer service</em></strong></span><br><span style="font-size: small;"> Your information helps us to more effectively respond to your customer service requests and support needs.</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;"><strong><em>To process transactions</em></strong></span><br><span style="font-size: small;"> Your information, whether public or private, will not be sold, exchanged, transferred, or given to any other company for any reason whatsoever, without your consent, other than for the express purpose of delivering the purchased product or service requested.</span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;"><strong><em>To administer a contest, promotion, survey, or other site feature.</em></strong></span></li> <li><span style="font-size: small;"><strong><em>To send periodic emails</em></strong></span><br><span style="font-size: small;"> The email address you provide for order processing may be used to send you information and updates pertaining to your order, in addition to receiving occasional company news, updates, related product, or service information, etc.</span></li></ul><p><span style="font-size: large;"><strong><span style="color: #7c1f1f;"><em>Note: If at any time you would like to unsubscribe from receiving future emails, we always include an unsubscribe option at the bottom of each email.</em></span></strong></span></p></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_6"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_6  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_6  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2>How do we protect your information?</h2><p>We take certain measures to enhance the security of our Site and products, as it is in our interest to do so. However, we make no representations as to the security or privacy of your information. It is in our interest to keep our websites secure, but we recommend that you use anti-virus software, firewalls, and other precautions to protect yourself from security threats.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_7"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_7  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_7  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2>What data our apps are collecting about the user?</h2><p>The only data that our apps are collecting about the user is the username and password in order to allow the user to log in to the user’s account.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_8"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_8  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_8  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2>How the user may request that their user data that has been collected or stored can be deleted?</h2><p>Users should be required to contact SimLab-Soft at info@simlab-soft.com for their data to be deleted. We respect such requests from users and we actioned on, regardless of the circumstance, unless otherwise required by law.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_9"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_9  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_9  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2 id="cookies">Do we use cookies?</h2><p>A cookie is a piece of data stored on the user’s computer tied to information about the user. SimLab-Soft Website uses cookies to collect traffic data and traffic through the purchase process. No personal data is collected. This information is passed on to analytic reports and used to monitor site traffic and completed purchases.</p><h4><strong>Disabling Cookies</strong></h4><p>&nbsp;You can prevent the setting of cookies by adjusting the settings on your browser (see your browser Help for how to do this). Disabling cookies will usually result in disabling certain functionality and features of the site. Therefore it is recommended that you do not disable cookies.</p><h4><strong>&nbsp;The Cookies We Set</strong></h4><p><span style="color: #606060;"><strong>Orders processing related cookies</strong></span></p><p>&nbsp;This site offers e-commerce or payment facilities and some cookies are essential to ensure that your order is remembered between pages so that we can process it properly.</p><p><span style="color: #606060;"><strong>&nbsp;Forms related cookies</strong></span></p><p>&nbsp;When you submit data to through a form such as those found on contact pages or comment forms cookies may be set to remember your user details for future correspondence.</p><p><span style="color: #606060;"><strong>&nbsp;Third Party Cookies&nbsp;</strong></span></p><p>In some special cases we also use cookies provided by trusted third parties. The following section details which third party cookies you might encounter through this site.</p><p>&nbsp;This site uses Google Analytics which is one of the most widespread and trusted analytics solution on the web for helping us to understand how you use the site and ways that we can improve your experience. These cookies may track things such as how long you spend on the site and the pages that you visit so we can continue to produce engaging content.&nbsp;</p><p>For more information on Google Analytics cookies, see the official Google Analytics page.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_10"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_10  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_10  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2>Do we transfer personal data abroad?</h2><p>We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others rights, property, or safety. However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses.</p><p>If you utilize our Services from a country other than the country where our servers are located, your communications with us may result in transferring your personal data across international borders. Also, when you call us or initiate a chat, we may provide you with support from one of our global locations outside your country of origin. In these cases, your personal data is handled according to this Privacy Policy.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_11"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_11  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_11  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2>Deletion of personal data</h2><p>You have the right to erasure. We will delete your personal data when we no longer need to process it in relation to one or more of the purposes set out above. Generally, we will store the most current data provided for you as long as you use our Services or products.</p><p>However, the data may be processed and stored for a longer period in order to provide you information on orders and services, and/or for us to improve the Services.</p><p>You may request your information be deleted by contacting <a href="mailto:support@SimLab-soft.com">support@SimLab-soft.com</a> and SimLab-Soft will delete the personal information it holds about you (unless we need to retain it for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy).</p></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_12"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_12  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_12  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2>Your rights</h2><p>You are at any time entitled to be informed of the personal data about you that we process, but with certain legislative exceptions. You also have the right to object to the collection and further processing of your personal data including profiling/automated decision-making. Furthermore, you have the right to have your personal data rectified, erased, or blocked. Moreover, you have the right to receive information about you that you have provided to us, and the right to have this information transmitted to another data controller (data portability).</p></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_13"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_13  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_13  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2>Changes to our Privacy Policy</h2><p>If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page, send an email notifying you of any changes, and/or update the privacy policy modification date herein.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_14"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_14  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_14  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2>Cancel your subscription</h2><p>To remove your email from our electronic newsletter subscription list, we always include an unsubscribe option at the bottom of each email.</p></div></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_3 et_section_regular"><div class="et_pb_row et_pb_row_15"><div class="et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_15  et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_15  et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_light"><div class="et_pb_text_inner"><p></p></div></div><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_code et_pb_code_0"><div class="et_pb_code_inner"><style>body{background-color:#202020 !important}</style></div></div></div></div></div><div class="et_pb_section et_pb_section_5 padde et_pb_fullwidth_section et_section_regular"><div class="et_pb_module et_pb_fullwidth_code et_pb_fullwidth_code_1"><div class="et_pb_code_inner"><div id="includedFooter">
<script type="text/javascript">
//var currentUsedProtocol = location.protocol;//window.alert(currentUsedProtocol);//var trialPageWithCurrentProtocol = currentUsedProtocol.concat("//www.simlab-soft.com/3d-products/simlab-composer-trial.aspx");//window.alert(trialPageWithCurrentProtocol);
jQuery.ajax({//url: trialPageWithCurrentProtocol,
		url: "/download/trial_download_number.aspx?h=3",
        success: function(result) {
	        var html = jQuery('<div>').html(result);
            var tagString = html.find("div#composerVerNo").html();
			var s1 = tagString.substring(tagString.lastIndexOf('https'));
			//alert(s1);
			var s2 = s1.substring(0, s1.lastIndexOf('.exe'));
			//alert(s2);
			var s3 = s2.substring(s2.lastIndexOf('v')+1);
			//alert(s3); 
			document.getElementById("placeComposerVerHere").innerHTML = s3;
			
	        var html2 = jQuery('<div>').html(result);
            var tagString2 = html2.find("div#composerVerNo2").html();
			var s11 = tagString2.substring(tagString2.lastIndexOf('https'));
			//alert(s1);
			var s22 = s11.substring(0, s11.lastIndexOf('.pkg'));
			//alert(s2);
			var s33 = s22.substring(s22.lastIndexOf('v')+1);
			//alert(s3); 
			document.getElementById("placeComposerVerHere2").innerHTML = s33;},});			
			
</script>
<style>
	#includedFooter{position: relative;z-index: 999;overflow: hidden;}
	.footer .colorWhite{color:rgba(255,255,255,1);}
	.footer .colorWhite2{color:rgba(255,255,255,0.75) !important;}	
    .footer .background_solution2{background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.13);}
	.footer .backgroundGrey{background-color:#202020;}
	.footer li{min-width: 180px;}
	.footer a:hover{color: rgba(207,179,32,1.00) !important}
	.footer .shadowBlackFooter{box-shadow: 0px 4px 37.75px rgba(0,0,0,1) !important;}
	@media (min-width:767px) and (max-width:1400px){
		.footer .changeWidth2,.footer .changeWidth4{padding-left: 10px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;}
		.footer .changeWidth2{-ms-flex: 0 0 19.5%;flex: 0 0 19.5%;max-width: 19.5%;}
		.footer .changeWidth4{-ms-flex: 0 0 40%;flex: 0 0 40%;max-width: 40%;}
		.footer .font14{font-size:10px} .footer .font16{font-size:12px} .footer .font18{font-size:14px}
	}
	@media (min-width:400px) and (max-width:1767px){
		.footer .changeWidth3{-ms-flex: 0 0 100%;flex: 0 0 100%;max-width: 100%;}
		.footer .df{display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;}
	}
</style>
